data.text: “Hulika weye ulanga, nizalonga,
Mafundizo yangu yezalaga fana madondo ya mvula
Nizadigong'onda zina da Mndewa Mulungu,
“Mndewa Mulungu ni luwe, sang'hano zake zigangamala
Mbali mweye hamwaminika bule kumwake,
Modahaze kumuliha ivo Mndewa Mulungu,
“Kumbukeni siku zifosile,
Mulungu yeli uchanyha ng'hani kawagolela wanhu uhazi.
mana uhazi wa Mndewa Mulungu ni wanhu wake.
Kawafika kuna iisi ili kudibwilingu,
Fana masumula yokaliza chisanja chake,
Mndewa Mulungu muhala kowalongoza wanhu wake
“Kawaleka watawale isi inuke,
Kaweng'ha samuli na matombo ya wanyama,
Wanhu wa Isilaili32:15 Chiebulaniya cholonga “Yeshuluni” zina dimwenga da Isilaili fambulo jake “yolonga ukweli.”  wanona na kutowa mateka,
Wamtenda Mndewa Mulungu yawone migongo kwa milungu yawo,
Watambikila maginyi yeli siyo milungu,
Hamumgesile Luwe yoyamwing'hileni ugima,
“Mndewa Mulungu kawona mbuli ino na kawalema,
Kalonga, ‘Sizawataza,’
Wanitenda niwone ludoko kwa nyang'hiti zawo,
Ludoko lwangu lwizakwaka fana moto
“Nizawagalila magayo
Wezadanganika kwa nzala na homa,
Ng'hondo izagala zifa nyingi kunze ya zikaye,
Nizawananga wawo,
Mbali sizawaleka wehi wawo waigode kuwa wawahuma wanhu wangu,
“Isilaili ni isi ilibule nzewele,
One wawile na ubala wahavimanyile habali wahumigwa,
Munhu imwe kodahaze kuwahuma wanhu 1,000,
Mana luwe wawo halingile na nguvu fana Luwe wetu,
Zabibu zawo zizalawa muna zizabibu za Sodoma na kulawa muna imigunda ya Gomola.
divai ilinga fana itendigwa na sumu za mazoka.
“Mndewa Mulungu kokumbuka chiya chiwatendile wehi
Chisasi nizalihiza niye mwenyewo,
Mndewa Mulungu kezawagombela wanhu wake
Maabaho Mndewa Mulungu kezawauza wanhu wake,
Yakulihi milungu idile nhambiko yenu
“ ‘Niye niiyo Mulungu,
Nogolosa mkono wangu kuulanga,
one nihanola zele jangu dimelemeta
Misale yangu nizaitenda ikolwe na damu,
“Mweye wanhu wa zisi wadeng'heleleni wanhu wa Mndewa Mulungu.
Musa na Yoshua mwana wa Nuni weza haulongozi wa wanhu na walonga mbuli zose zili muna uwila uno, muladi wanhu wa Isilaili wauhulike.
Musa viyakomeleze kuwalongela Waisilaili wose mbuli zili muna uwila uno,
kawalongela, “Zikeni muna imizoyo yenu mbuli zose zonimulongeleni diyelo, muladi muwalagilize wanenu wasondelele chigangamavu mbuli zose za lagilizo dino.
Kwaviya malagilizo yano siyo mbuli muhala mbali ugima wenu. Zindilileni malagilizo yayo muladi mukale siku nyingi muna iisi ija yomuhita kuisola kuumwambu wa Yoludani.”
Siku iyo iyo Mndewa Mulungu kamulongela Musa,
“Kwela mulima uno wa Abalimu, mulima wa Nebo, uli kuna iisi ya Moabu, voilola na bululu da Yeliko, ukailole isi ya Kanaani yoniweng'ha Waisilaili waisole.
Kwizadanganikila kuna umulima uwo fana viyadanganike sekulu wako Haluni kuna umulima wa Holi,

kwaviya mweye wose waidi mukala hamunihuwila haulongozi ha Waisilaili. Vimukalile muna yamazi ya Meliba, habehi na bululu da Kadeshi, kuna ichuwala cha Sini, muleka kulagusa kwela kwangu hagati ya Waisilaili.
Kwizaiwona isi ili kuulongozi wako, mbali hwizakwingila muna iisi iyo yoniweng'ha Waisilaili.”
